thread.title: Minh Anh Travel Agency launches new touring plans
thread.title_full: Minh Anh Travel Agency launches new touring plans

author: prbuzz.com
title: Minh Anh Travel Agency launches new touring plans
text:
According to some latest news, Minh Anh Travel Agency, the creators of Vietnam tours and travel off the beaten path, has introduced fresh touring plans that guarantees cost-effective travel for the tourists. As per a recent survey, Vietnam accommodated over 7 million international tourists in the year 2012 and the numbers has since then kept on increasing. The survey further illustrated that Vietnam as a tourist destination is most favored by high-end tourists over its neighboring countries like India and Thailand.
With such high influx of national as well as international visitors, the Minh Anh Travel Agency has taken over the mission to provide these tourists a proper guide to what Vietnam has to offer. The agency comprises of a group of energetic guides with readiness to serve both domestic and global clients. They are licensed under the Vietnam Investment Plan Ministry and Vietnam National Administration of Tourism.
According to the website of Minh Anh Travel Agency, voyagevietnam.co, every travel and tour package is affordable and designed to meet every budget. Travel Vietnam Cheap range from 200 USD per person, appropriate for small groups and are accompanied by tour guides. Some of the other cheap travel packages provided by the agency include Minh Anh Travel Specials, Cultural Tours, Circuit Minibus, Travel Photo Vietnam, Vietnam Family Friendly, and Trekking Vietnam. The agency also expressed that they have special policy for old customers too.
Vietnam is unlike many places in the world. It has been recognized as a safe holiday destination and this is shown by the increasing number of tourists every year. Here, tourists can enjoy local and international cuisines, fabulous hotels, resorts, sceneries, beaches, etc. Many people visit the country in the hoe to learn more about the countryâ€™s rich culture, history and tradition. The efforts of agencies like the Minh Anh Travel Agency can certainly help in better growth of the tourism industry. For more details go to http://voyagevietnam.co/
About voyagevietnam.co
Voyagevietnam.co is the website of Minh Anh travel Agency, Vietnam. The agency is known to offer out of the box travel and tours in Vietnam at very competitive prices.
